sources.title: SWING HOSTESS video quality upgrade
sources.description: “Nice surprise” “Martha Tilton really swings it!” “Hostess with the mostess” “For fans of the liltin’ Miss Tilton” “An absolute Joy” (IMDB reviews quotes). This print is sharper and with better contrast than the existing IA copy. A cute and sassy wartime musical/comedy staring the popular Martha Tilton who had a number of hit singles fronting the Benny Goodman Band. Lively supporting cast and adequate production values. IMDB rating 6.1. Directed by Sam Newfield. Released in 1944. Complete print (minus a few missing frames)
